00044 float BL_ScalarInterpolator::GetValue(float currentTime) const
00045 {
00046     // XXX 2.4x IPO_GetFloatValue(m_blender_adt, m_channel, currentTime);
00047     return evaluate_fcurve(m_fcu, currentTime);
00048 }
00049 
00050 BL_InterpolatorList::BL_InterpolatorList(bAction *action)
00051 {
00052     if (action==NULL)
00053         return;
00054     
00055     for (FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)action->curves.first; fcu; fcu= (FCurve *)fcu->next) {
00056         if (fcu->rna_path) {
00057             BL_ScalarInterpolator *new_ipo = new BL_ScalarInterpolator(fcu); 
00058             //assert(new_ipo);
00059             push_back(new_ipo);
00060         }
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 BL_InterpolatorList::~BL_InterpolatorList()
00065 {
00066     BL_InterpolatorList::iterator i;
00067     for (i = begin(); !(i == end()); ++i) {
00068         delete *i;
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 KX_IScalarInterpolator *BL_InterpolatorList::GetScalarInterpolator(const char *rna_path, int array_index)
00073 {
00074     for (BL_InterpolatorList::iterator i = begin(); (i != end()) ; i++ )
00075     {
00076         FCurve *fcu= (static_cast<BL_ScalarInterpolator *>(*i))->GetFCurve();
00077         if (array_index==fcu->array_index && strcmp(rna_path, fcu->rna_path)==0)
00078             return *i;
00079     }
00080     return NULL;
00081 }
